title: when getting to lvl 6/7 champion mastery
body: so when you are lvl 6 for example and wanna get to lvl 7 with a champ then you gotta have 3 games with S but the thing i dont understand is that you can either have 500 blue essence or one champ permanent or a champion chard for the champ. can someone explain what one champ permanent means. like for katarina i had bought her and i had 3 lvl  7 tokens but it dont work i can only unlock lvl 7 with blue essence. some please explain the other methods since i dont understand them

replies.body:
the champion shards are the shards with champions you get through chests or mystery champion shards, so if you have forexample a kata champion shard , you can use it to make her lv 6/lv7.
The difference between premanent and not means if you reroll 3 champ shards you can get 1 champion that you already have you have it in your loot that is now permant

A permanent is a card in your hextech look that would appear if you already own the item.  For example, if you already own Katarina and end up rerolling your shards into a Katarina, it would appear as a Permanent card.  Lukas' info is spot on!
thank you for explaining needed it :)
